table-type.name: Person_Relationship
table-type.description: Basic information required for an entity that may be related to a person.

table-type.name: PersonOrg_Relationship
table-type.description: Basic information required for an entity that may be related to a person/org combination.

table-type.name: PersonStudy_Relationship
table-type.description: Basic information required for an entity that may be related to a person/org combination.

table-type.name: Person_Preference
table-type.description: This table allows a developer to store preferences for any Person record. The general format is to store the equivalent of an environment variable and its corresponding value as a string. This can be enhanced later.

table-type.name: Person_Log
table-type.description: This table allows a developer to store information about any and all activity that occurs within a table. This includes everything from adding a record to updating it and deleting it and anything else that needs to be logged.
